za.ac.wits.elen4010.fluidsim.gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • za.ac.wits.elen4010.fluidsim.gui.GUI

  •  class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The GUI is the main class of the program and is designed to be able to spawn all of the different components of the application. Namely: a Menu to select playback material and enter capture mode, a DataPanel to capture material for processing and a DisplayPanel to playback the results of computation

    • Nested Class Summary

      The file type which was determined using the determineFileType() function

      The error message to be displayed if no simulation data was actually contained in the file which was loaded

      The error message to be displayed if no simulation data has been loaded but the user tries to visualise
      private static java.lang.String NO_DATA_TO_WRITE
      The error message to be displayed if a file couldn't be written due to there being no data to write
      private static java.lang.String NO_RAW_FRAMES_IN_FILE
      The error message to be displayed if no RawFrames are in the file
      private static FileWriter<SimulationInput> outputWriter
      Stores the file writer which is used throughout the program for the saving of files
      private static DataProcessor programDataProcessor
      Stores the program programs data processor to be used in every data capture session
      private static java.lang.String[] SIMULATION_INPUT_NAMES
      Supported simulation input data file extensions NOTE: these should be gicen in upper case to work with the determineFileType() method
      private static java.lang.String[] SIMULATION_OUTPUT_NAMES
      Supported simulation output data file extensions NOTE: these should be given in upper case to work with the determineFileType() method

      Stores the file reader that should be user to read capture data to the program

      Stores the file reader that should be used to render each frame
      private static java.lang.String UNSUPORTED_FILE_TYPE
      The error message to be displayed if a file doesn't end in the correct extension to be read
      private static GraphicalPanel visualisationPanel
      Stores the panel which will be used to display the results of the computation

      • determineFileType

        private static GUI.loadedFileType determineFileType(java.lang.String filePath)
        Determines the file type by the full path passed to the function
        Parameters:
        filePath - The absolute path to the file
        Returns:
        The type of file NOTE: if the file isn't supported then the UNSUPORTED option is returned
